content: this legal case took place in the municipal court of pazin and involves a cost procedure the specific details and parties involved are not mentioned the case started on july 11 2022 and involves a certain amount of money 71933 kn equivalent to 22815 eur the procedure has been ongoing since an unspecified date in 2019 after 3 years and 8 months a final resolution was reached in a coownership property dispute the parties agreed to dissolve the coownership and transfer full ownership of certain properties to each party the counterparty has also been ordered to pay the proposer a monetary amount of 6430 another legal text mentions a monetary amount of 52 kuna and a ratio of 853 but the parties involved are not mentioned party a is owed 54 euros by party b and has established a lien on party bs real estate the court examined various documents and expert opinions to determine the status of the properties involved the court awarded certain properties to each party based on their coownership shares and addressed the payment of any differences in value the costs of the proceeding will be borne by the coowners in proportion to their ownership shares either party has the right to seek enforcement of the decision
